caption:
Give skin what it needs and nothing else! The concept of listening to your skin may sometimes get overcomplicated. Here is the thing—listening to your skin and giving it what it needs is really about being aware of your skin behaviors. 
 
Tightness, excessive oiliness, dryness/flaking, congestion, irritation—these are all behaviors that are signals sent by your skin in response to factors such as environment, the products you’re using, or changes in your personal health.

To reset skin to its happiest, healthiest state, we recommend taking a #drunkbreak. 

During a #drunkbreak, we avoid the #suspicious6 (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical sunscreens, fragrances/ dyes, and SLS). These are six categories of ingredients, which, research has shown, can be at the root of common skin issues, such as sensitivity and breakouts.
